막돼먹은 엔지니어의 머신러닝 개발

  2. 로지스틱 회귀 (Logistic Regression)

  6. 잠재 인수 모델 (Latent Factor Model)
  7. Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)
  8. Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM)
  9. Monte Carlo Learning
  10. SARSA Learning
  11. Q-Learning
  12. Q 네트워크 (Q-Networks)
  13. Policy Gradient (PG)
